title: CHICKPEA BLINIS WITH GRILLED VEGETABLES AND LEMON CREAM [VEGAN, GLUTEN-FREE]
directions: Add all ingredients apart from the olive oil to a blender and let it run for a minute, before very slowly adding the olive oil, while still blending on full speed. The slower you add the olive oil, the more the sauce will thicken, so take your time.

Adjust the seasoning (more salt, horseradish, lemon juice, dill etc) before pouring the sauce into a covered jar and placing it in the fridge – where it will thicken further – while you prepare the blinis.
ingredients: Four small stems fresh dill (more to taste)
1/2 tsp shredded horseradish (optional – avoid if you don’t like the strong flavor)
